Articles.Content: WWI, right? Seems to me like it's finally getting some attention. Although trench warfare isn't that interesting for a game. However, more than trench warfare happened during WWI.

36 minutes ago, Bill Phil said:

WWI, right? Seems to me like it's finally getting some attention. Although trench warfare isn't that interesting for a game. However, more than trench warfare happened during WWI.

It's not trench warfare whatsoever.

4 minutes ago, legoclone09 said:

It's not trench warfare whatsoever.

Well, yeah. Design necessitates that, otherwise it'd probably be pretty boring.

Just now, Bill Phil said:

Well, yeah. Design necessitates that, otherwise it'd probably be pretty boring.

Yeah.

We always have Verdun then!

I think it actually is trench warfare.

And cheaper.

If what I heard is still true, France is a DLC.

As a french, meh

Not that I plan on buying another resking of battlefield 3 or something

11 hours ago, Fluburtur said:

If what I heard is still true, France is a DLC.

As will be Russia.

But of course America is front and centre despite only having boots on the ground for less than a year of the conflict.  I'm not going to say more as I don't want to send this off into an unwelcome direction, but things like this don't exactly give me the impression they'll be treating the conflict with the respect it deserves.

Well... At least it gives me the opportunity to join a Verdun match as either Poilus or Chaussers and say something along the lines of "so glad I bought the France DLC, worth every penny"

Or, "I like how EA decided to include minor nations like France in the game. Even though America obviously won the war all by itself it's good to see the others get recognition"

It surprises me hyping a game still works, after so many disappointments. Especially the big developers seem to have a business model that depends more on marketing than on quality products. People believe all sorts of stories, pre-order a game or buy it upon release, only to be sorely disappointed yet again.

When will we learn to hold off and wait until the proper reviews are in?
What sort of devs make a game about WWI and have France be DLC? Oh, it's EA.

8 hours ago, Robotengineer said:

What sort of devs make a game about WWI and have France be DLC? Oh, it's EA. 

The same company that makes a WWI game where players can hipfire the heavy, water cooled MG-08/15...
I cant run that game. My PC will explode.
Until they release the meat-grinder that was Galliopli, I'm not interested....

Also, zeppelins on the Western Front.

Need I say more?
